name: 90 Minute IPA
description: Esquire Magazine calls our 90 Minute .IPA., "perhaps the best I.P.A. in America." An Imperial I.P.A. brewed to be savored from a snifter. A big beer with a great malt backbone that stands up to the extreme hopping rate. This beer is an excellent candidate for use with Randall The Enamel Animal!
style: Imperial or Double India Pale Ale
